alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Natchitoches; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 10:17PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Jackson, southeastern De Soto, Red River, northwestern Natchitoches, southeastern Bienville and northwestern Sabine Parishes through 1115 PM CDT... At 1017 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Ringgold to near Converse. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Coushatta, Converse, Allen, Oak Grove, Pleasant Hill, Martin, Hodge, North Hodge, Hall Summit, East Hodge, Saline, Lucky, Ashland, Castor, Edgefield, Powhatan, Lake End, Hanna and Pelican. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northwestern Louisiana.
